cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever a creature is put in your hand from the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token.
Dash {3}{B}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Counter target creature or planeswalker spell.
• Exile target Dragon card from your graveyard. Create a number of tapped treasure tokens equal to its mana value.
• The next Demon spell you cast this turn gains delve.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The most high-ranking dragons of Silumgar's brood are buried within the treasure vaults of the Ukud Necropolis, forbidden from being raised.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you discard a card, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature.
Whenever equipped creature dies, create two tapped Blood tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.
Equip {1}

Enchant land
I, II, III — Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped this turn, create a Food token.
IV — Sacrifice any number of Foods. You draw a card and gain 3 life for each Food sacrificed this way.
​

cards.rules_text:
When this Attraction enters, each opponent creates a Tarmogoyf token. 
Visit — Destroy up to one target Lhurgoyf. Then if your opponents control no Lhurgoyfs, claim the prize!
Prize — You draw three cards and gain 3 life. Sacrifice this Attraction, then open an attraction.
{1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Legends never die: They become a part of you”[/i]

cards.rules_text: {1}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Amass Zombies 1. You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. [i](To amass Zombies 1, put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)[/i]
{G}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 3/3 green and white Centaur creature token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Unlike the Gruul, who sing only songs of war, the Calamities we herald bear peace.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
{1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a permanent card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token with “Sacrifice this token: Add {C}.”
